metadata.title: CVE-2010-5105 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: The undo save quit routine in the kernel in Blender 2.5, 2.63a, and earlierallows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on thequit.blend temporary file. NOTE: this issue might be a regression ofCVE-2008-1103.

criterions.comment: blender package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
